name: ActionLinks

methods.name: createActionLinkGroupDefinitionâ€‹
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinition createActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinitionInput actionLinkGroup)
methods.description: Create an action link group definition. To associate an action link group with a feed element, first create an action link group definition. Then post a feed element with an associated actions capability.

params.name: actionLinkGroup
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. A ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinitionInput object that defines the action link group.

methods.name: deleteActionLinkGroupDefinition
methods.signature: public static void deleteActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
methods.description: Delete an action link group definition. Deleting an action link group definition removes all references to it from feed elements.

params.name: actionLinkGroupId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link group.

methods.name: getActionLink
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.PlatformAction getActionLink(String communityId, String actionLinkId)
methods.description: Get information about an action link, including state for the context user.

params.name: actionLinkId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link.

methods.name: getActionLinkDiagnosticInfo
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ActionLinkDiagnosticInfo getActionLinkDiagnosticInfo(String communityId, String actionLinkId)
methods.description: Get diagnostic information returned when an action link executes. Diagnostic information is given only for users who can access the action link.

params.name: actionLinkId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link.

methods.name: getActionLinkGroup
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.PlatformActionGroup getActionLinkGroup(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
methods.description: Get information about an action link group including state for the context user.

params.name: actionLinkGroupId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link group.

methods.name: getActionLinkGroupDefinition
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.ActionLinkGroupDefinition getActionLinkGroupDefinition(String communityId, String actionLinkGroupId)
methods.description: Get information about an action link group definition.

params.name: actionLinkGroupId
params.description: Use either the ID for a community, internal, or null. The ID of the action link group.

description: Create, delete, and get information about an action link group definition; get information about an action link group; get action link diagnostic information.
